author: ivan
msg: * buckets/dechunk_buckets.c
(serf_dechunk_read): Intialize *LEN to zero in state done.

author: lgo
msg: Add CC, CFLAGS, LINKFLAGS, LIBS and CPPFLAGS variables to the scons script.
* SConstruct:
(_converter,
RawListVariable): New functions, read comma separated list from cmdline.
(opts.AddVariables): Add new variables CC, CFLAGS, LINKFLAGS, LIBS and
CPPFLAGS. Add this to the variables the script alreade generates per
platform.

author: lgo
msg: On the 1.3.x branch:
Merge all pending SConstruct inmprovements from trunk:
r2000: Minor build/ignore tweaks.
r2002 + r2003: Don't try to add a rpath on Windows
r2018+r2019: Mostly fix compilation using SCons on Windows.
r2026: Add a simple SCons generator to generate the Windows specific
serf.def file
r2027: Allow building serf with a static apr/apu on Windows.

author: lgo
msg: Add some extra tests for dechunk buckets.
* test/test_buckets.c
(test_dechunk_buckets): Add scenario with 2 and 3 chunks.

author: lgo
msg: Fix issue while reading chunks: handle APR_EAGAIN between CR and LF or right
after CRLF. This fixes the unit test added in r2031.
* buckets/dechunk_buckets.c
(serf_dechunk_read): When reading CRLF with status APR_EAGAIN, don't return
the read CR or CRLF to the caller.
* test/test_buckets.c
(test_dechunk_buckets): New test for dechunk_buckets.
(test_buckets): Run the new test.
